Mod.Name: ProjectHELLFIRE Plus (GF Textures)
Mod.Author: MCINDUS + Slimebucket
Mod.Description: Project Hellfire - GF Texture replacement mod. Version 2.0 now live! Alternate Bahamut and Brothers added Many textures upscaled from 512x512 to 1024x1024! Diabolos Replaced Original mod created by MCINDUS ffnx conversion and extra textures by Slimebucket

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: v2 - upscaled textures from 512x512 to 1024x1024 - Alternate bahamut and Brothers added v1 5 - alternate Ifrit Added
